oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: A fragment, regarding the ceremony to be performed by the maiden, was also given by D !kw in (L V.
20. 5592 and 5593, translated, and 5591 rev., note). An account of the ceremony performed by a new maiden with her father's hunting dogs to protect them and help them hunt well.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A fragment of an account of a ceremony performed by Bushman maidens in order that their father's dogs should hunt well
